application.doc: Importing an API Access Control Resource Server(s)

param.name: instance_name
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy Instance.

method.name: POST
method.id: Importing an API Access Control Resource Server(s)
method.doc: To import one or more API Access Control Resource Servers with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the API Access Control resource server URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: config_file
param.doc: The zipped config file to be imported.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
